amendment.description: An amendment numbered 55 printed in Part D of House Report 118-216 to ensure no funds to enforce or implement a COVID-19 vaccine mandate for international travelers.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Boebert amendment (A030) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Boebert amendment (A030) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Boebert amendment (A030) Agreed to by voice vote.
